Interface OnCommandListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkClient, SendActivity

    public interface OnCommandListener
    Implement this to be able to be notified of commands

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCommand(java.net.InetAddress origin, AbstractCommand command)
      Called whenever a new command arrives

      • onCommand

        void onCommand(java.net.InetAddress origin,
               AbstractCommand command)
        Called whenever a new command arrives
        Parameters:
        origin - hostname of whoever sent the packet
        command - the command that was sent
